Title: Emergency Care
Description:
I... am alive... but barely. They killed the rest. My friends... and family...

I must return to the village... But, I do not have long, and cannot move on my own... are you a healer? I... have a healing potion in my hut... search my belongings. You can use your magic, if you have it.
ObjectivesText: Heal Sage Liao to get him back on his feet.
RewardText: Thank you. I suppose... I'll need to ask you to do a bit more before I can return to the village. I cannot leave the bodies of my friends and family here.

Objectives.Text: Heal Sage Liao with Spells or the Draught in his Hut
